name: Competitive Minecraft
short_description:
This mod is all about making, as the name says, Minecraft into a more comptetitive-oriented game. Therefore this mod is about playing with, and against, your friends.

This mod will mainly be focused on Capture the Flag, but will have Spleef-, Tunnel "Defense"- and 4 in-a-row content as well.
summary: A competitive Minecraft mod and map
